title: Increasing Renewable Energy
text: Promoting policies that support the development and deployment of renewable energy sources such as solar, wind, and geothermal power.

title: Energy Efficiency
text: Advocating for policies that increase energy efficiency, such as building codes and appliance standards, to reduce energy consumption and associated greenhouse gas emissions.

title: Carbon Pricing
text: Supporting policies that put a price on carbon, such as a carbon tax or cap-and-trade system, to provide a financial incentive for reducing carbon emissions and transitioning to cleaner energy sources.

title: Electric Transportation
text: Advocating for policies that promote the adoption of electric vehicles and charging infrastructure to reduce dependence on fossil fuels.

title: Grid modernization and Energy storage
text: Promoting policies that modernize the electric grid and promote the development of energy storage technologies to better integrate renewable energy sources and improve reliability and resiliency of the grid.

title: Research and Development
text: Advocating for increased funding for research and development of new energy technologies, to accelerate the transition to a cleaner, more sustainable energy system.

title: Environmental Justice
text: Advocating for policies that ensure that disadvantaged communities are not disproportionately affected by the negative impacts of pollution and environmental degradation.
